speaker.description: Educational content creator and U-Report ambassador
speaker.whotheyare: Peachy Liv is an 18-year-old activist and content creator from Indonesia.
speaker.whylisten: Olivina Maskan, also known as Peachy Liv, aims to advance the world's quality of education and support social equality by harnessing the power of social media. She is the author of two educational books, You(th) and You(th) Academia, about how young people can use emotional intelligence and curiosity in developing personal strengths. She is also the cofounder of Arise Arose, a youth organization that aims to spread knowledge and initiate discussions for the greater good of Indonesia. She is also an ambassador for U-Report, a social messaging tool developed by UNICEF to improve citizen engagement, inform leaders and foster positive change.
